title: STAR GUARDIAN LEGION
body:
Since the new star guardian skins are going to come out, and there are five star guardian skins.
Does anybody want to do a star guardian team with me (i am only bronze 2, but i will try my best.)
I was thinking top lulu, poppy jg, lux mid, janna sup and jinx adc.
If you r interested add me and join the club star guardian legion, i am also looking for a star guardian club tag so can anybody help me find one thx u
and plz join it will be fun
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
i would love to join! I'll be lux mid :)
{{champion:99}}
